How Do I Set Up LMC 8.4 Config File

Some LMC camera users don’t know how to set up XML files. Here we share the procedure. You just need to complete some easy instructions. After that, you can easily get benefits from LMC 8.4 config files.
First, install the LMC 8.4 Apps & enter directly inside the app. Now give permission the Apk permission by clicking on allow button. Then click on the menu icon above
Now, click on More Settings.
Then, you will see the text Config Settings and you will click on Config Settings.
Now click on Save Settings.
Clicking on Save Settings will show up like a write option. Now you will write something you want and click on yes writing.

Then you will enter the File Manager of your phone directly & go to the Download File. Now, copy the LMC 8.4 Config File, and after copying the Config File, you will see a folder called LMC 8.4 in your File Manager.
Now open return LMC 8.4 Camera Apps and double-click twice on the left or right side of the camera’s shutter button.
If you double-click, you will see the XML Config File. Then you will select the Config File and click on the import text.
The diameter is ready to absorb your work and your LMC 8.4 Camera apps are ready to take pictures of everything.
